page.shortlink: api client api a5 chart guides annotation definition text object
page.description: The definition of a text annotation.

discussion.p: The "text" annotation can be used to add arbitrary HTML to the chart. This HTML is located relative to the plot area, and can optional be either explicit relative to the area, or implicit relative to the axes. This can be used to add text to points of interest, or a title to the chart.

property.name: location
property.description: The location of the text. See *[link:A5.chart Definition Location Object]*.

property.name: align
property.description: How to align the text relative to the location. Values can be "center", "above", "below", "before", "after", "adj-above", "adj-below", "adj-before" and "adj-after". Multiple alignments can be applied by combining values using spaces (for example "above after"). The "adj" prefix will make the given alignment occur after the rotation (if any) has been applied.

property.name: rotate
property.description: The rotation (in degrees) to apply to the text.

property.name: major
property.description: The major offset relative to the alignment. The default value is 0.

property.name: minor
property.description: The minor offset relative to the alignment. The default value is 0.

property.name: html
property.description: The HTML text to display. A function called with "data" (see *[link:A5.chart Render Data Object]*) and "temp" can be used to dynamically calculate the HTML.

property.name: className
property.description: The class name to add to the text element. A function called with "data" (see *[link:A5.chart Render Data Object]*) and "temp" can be used to dynamically calculate the class name.

property.name: style
property.description: The style to add to the text element. A function called with "data" (see *[link:A5.chart Render Data Object]*) and "temp" can be used to dynamically calculate the style.

property.name: attrs
property.description: The attributes to add to the text element. A function called with "data" (see *[link:A5.chart Render Data Object]*) and "temp" can be used to dynamically calculate the attributes.

property.name: tip
property.description: The mouseover tip to add to the text element. A function called with "data" (see *[link:A5.chart Render Data Object]*) and "temp" can be used to dynamically calculate the tip.
